alert.note: Alert for Northwest Yell County; Southern Johnson County; Southern Pope County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:02AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Logan, south central Johnson, northeastern Yell and southwestern Pope Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 601 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Knoxville to Subiaco. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Danville... Dardanelle... Pottsville... Lamar... Ola... London... Knoxville... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Carden Bottoms... Mt Nebo State Park... Plainview in Yell County... Lake Dardanelle... Petit Jean River WMA... Galla Creek WMA... Midway in Logan County... Mosley... Taral... Belleville... Corinth... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for central and western Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Yell County; Southern Johnson County; Southern Pope County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest
